title: Fictitious Employee
description: Unauthorized person is setup as active in payroll.

title: Employee Pay Rate is Inaccurate (SOX Payroll Process)
description: Employee pay rate does not match authorized pay rate.

title: Unmaintained Firewall
description: Incorrect and/or unmaintained firewall configurations can leave our internal network vulnerable to attack.

title: Unauthorized Network Access
description: Access to internal networks by unauthorized parties can result in a data breach, the introduction of malicious software, and reputational harm, among others.

title: Data Breach
description: Loss of organizational data, including sensitive data

title: Phishing Campaign
description: Campaign by malicious entities to obtain login credentials and unauthorized network access

title: Natural Disaster
description: Natural disaster affecting data processing and/or business operations

title: Datacenter Fire
description: Fire affecting a company datacenter

title: Reputational Harm
description: Any harm, real or perceived, to the reputation and/or brand of the company and/or its subsidiaries

title: Stolen IT Assets
description: Theft of company IT assets

title: Backup Failures
description: Failure of the backup system, resulting in no available backups during a DR event.

title: Inadequate System Logging
description: System logs that do not provide sufficient information to respond to security incidents, perform root cause analysis, and/or forensic analysis

title: Unsupported Operating Systems
description: Systems using unsupported operating systems which do not receive regular security updates

title: Social Engineering - Physical Access
description: Unauthorized physical access to restricted areas through the use of social engineering

title: Disaster Recovery - Ops
description: Current DR capabilities do not include an alternate recovery site.

title: Loss of Leadership
description: Loss of executive leadership team due to calamity, or loss of access to leadership team

title: Loss of Key Vendor
description: Loss of a key vendor for any reason (cessation of operations, natural disaster, etc.)

title: Unauthorized Expensify accounts created
description: Unauthorized Expensify accounts created

title: Unqualified Employees
description: Hiring process doesn't filter out unqualified prospects for IT jobs

title: Failure to conduct a handoff meeting
description: Failure to conduct a handoff meeting between the project manager/team and the capture manager could result in a lack of information about the client and expectations being shared, resulting in a failure to meeting client expectations and needs.

title: Failure to use the logs
description: Failure to use the logs (ex. Action Item Log, Decision Item Log) can create a downstream failure as the logs are integrated and pulled into dashboard style reporting at the enterprise level. There is a risk of showing a false negative or false positive if these logs are not implemented or maintained.

title: Not adhering or tailoring to the predefined COMPASS standards
description: Not adhering or tailoring to the predefined COMPASS standards in the initiation phase could result in an unsuccessful project start up and is the root cause of past project challenges (project not set up for success).
